Package simulation

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.SimulatorAbs
      • simulation.Simulation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Simulator
    public class Simulation
extends SimulatorAbs
    Simulation.java This is a model class that holds the information about the simulation (parameters, ant colony, pending event container, graph...) and is a subclass of the abstract class SimulatorAbs.java
    Since:
    04-26-2019
    Author:
    John Mendonça, Manuel Domingues, Rúben Gomes

    • Method Detail

      • beginSimulation

        public void beginSimulation()
        Begins the simulation. Initializes the variables. Schedules observer events and first move events and starts executing the events contained in the pending event container.

      • getPec

        public PECs getPec()
        Gets the pending event container
        Returns:
        a PEC specifying the pec.

      • setPec

        public void setPec​(PECs pec)
        Sets the pending event container parameter
        Parameters:
        pec - is the pending event container to be set

      • getInst

        public double getInst()
        Gets the current instant of the simulation
        Returns:

        Sets the current instant of the simulation
        Parameters:
        instant - is the current instant of the simulation to be set

        public int getMoveCounter()
